SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USP_USR_UMHS_UPDATE_CUSTOM_STATUS
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: UM Dev
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_UMHS_UPDATE_CUSTOM_STATUS as begin update USR_INTERACTION_EXTENSION_29442 set INTERACTION_STATUSCODE_CODEID = (SELECT id from USR_INTERACTION_STATUSCODE where DESCRIPTION = 'Completed') from dbo.INTERACTION inner JOIN dbo.USR_INTERACTION_EXTENSION_29442 IEX ON INTERACTION.ID = IEX.ID inner JOIN USR_INTERACTION_STATUSCODE UIS ON IEX.INTERACTION_STATUSCODE_CODEID = UIS.ID where interaction.STATUS = 'Completed' and UIS.DESCRIPTION <> 'Completed'
update USR_INTERACTION_EXTENSION_29442 set INTERACTION_STATUSCODE_CODEID = (SELECT id from USR_INTERACTION_STATUSCODE where DESCRIPTION = 'Cancelled') from dbo.INTERACTION inner JOIN dbo.USR_INTERACTION_EXTENSION_29442 IEX ON INTERACTION.ID = IEX.ID inner JOIN USR_INTERACTION_STATUSCODE UIS ON IEX.INTERACTION_STATUSCODE_CODEID = UIS.ID where interaction.STATUS = 'Cancelled' and UIS.DESCRIPTION <> 'Cancelled'
update USR_INTERACTION_EXTENSION_29442 set INTERACTION_STATUSCODE_CODEID = (SELECT id from USR_INTERACTION_STATUSCODE where DESCRIPTION = 'Declined') from dbo.INTERACTION inner JOIN dbo.USR_INTERACTION_EXTENSION_29442 IEX ON INTERACTION.ID = IEX.ID inner JOIN USR_INTERACTION_STATUSCODE UIS ON IEX.INTERACTION_STATUSCODE_CODEID = UIS.ID where interaction.STATUS = 'Declined' and UIS.DESCRIPTION <> 'Declined'
end
